Name: Decorous Harmony
Title: Yun Jin: Decorous Harmony
Source: Reward for inviting Yun Jin to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Decorous Harmony
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1607]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1607] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S16073]</color>.
When $[A1607], who has this card equipped, is on the field, and you trigger <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116073]</color>: If you have no cards in your Hand, this Skill deals +2 additional DMG.
(You must have $[A1607] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C116073.Name: Flying Cloud Flag Formation
C116073.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When your character uses a Normal Attack:</color> If you have no more than 1 card in your Hand, this Skill costs 1 less Elemental Die.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color> (Can stack. Max 4 stacks)

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
